text: The 4 arrondissements of the Oise department are: # Arrondissement of Beauvais, (prefecture of the Oise department: Beauvais) with 245 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 229,183 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Clermont, (subprefecture: Clermont) with 146 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 130,333 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Compiègne, (subprefecture: Compiègne) with 156 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 182,266 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Senlis, (subprefecture: Senlis) with 132 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 281,760 in 2016. ==History== In 1800 the arrondissements of Beauvais, Clermont, Compiègne and Senlis were established. The arrondissement of Clermont was disbanded in 1926, and restored in 1942.Historique de l'Oise ==References== Oise
title: Arrondissements of the Oise department
